titleInfo.title: Letter from William Lockyer Merewether to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter introducing Colonel Charles Herbert, who has been sent to Baghdad (as Officiating Political Agent, Turkish Arabia). Merewether believes the appointment to be a reward for Herbert's defence of Attock in 1848.The letter is dated 16 August, however as Colonel Herbert's appointment in Baghdad commenced on 29 May 1868 this letter can be assumed to be from the same year.
